role.argrole: the thing being focused or concentrated on

example.parse: (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يقول) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP فيندريش)) (PUNC :) (S (PUNC ") (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ضمن) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المفاهيم) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجديدة)))) (PUNC ,) (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I نجد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (ADVP (ADV+CASE_INDEF_ACC ايضاً)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC مميزات) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN كتابة) (NP (NOUN_PROP حسن) (NOUN_PROP داود)))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الخاصة))) (PUNC ,) (S-NOM (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_NOM تركيز) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الفرد)))))
